BERNIE1.original: ~r~Bernie has been bashed.
~r~Bernie is dead.
~b~Bernie~s~ has fallen off his scooter, pick him up.
BERNIE1.translated: ~b~Bernie~s~从他的摩托上摔下来了，接上他。

BERNIE1.original: ~s~PLACEHOLDER~n~Scripted cutscene with gypsy suit anims.~n~Bernie gets hit with a baseball bat by a gay basher.
BERNIE1.translated: ~s~PLACEHOLDER~n~Scripted cutscene with gypsy suit anims.~n~Bernie gets hit with a baseball bat by a gay basher.

BERNIE1.original: ~r~You are jogging too close. The hater will not attack.
BERNIE1.translated: ~r~你离Bernie距离太近了。仇同者不会攻击。

BERNIE1.original: ~s~Take down the ~r~hater.
~s~Exit the vehicle. Driving inside the park draws too much attention.
BERNIE1.translated: ~s~下车。在公园开车太引人注目了。

BERNIE1.original: ~r~Bernie wants you to jog behind him.
~s~Pick up ~b~Bernie~s~.
~s~Lose your wanted level.
~r~Bernie wants you to jog behind him, not kill people.
BERNIE1.translated: ~r~Bernie想要你跟在他后面慢跑，而不是杀人。

BERNIE1.original: Take Bernie to ~y~Perseus~s~ in The Exchange.
BERNIE1.translated: 带Bernie去证交区的~y~神之子服饰。

BERNIE1.original: ~s~Placeholder! ~n~ Mocap Cutscene
~s~Don't leave ~b~Bernie~s~ behind.
~r~Bernie is not happy. You are too far from him.
~s~Follow ~b~Bernie~s~ as he jogs, but keep your distance.
~r~The hater got away.
~r~The hater will live to hate another day.
~s~Take Bernie to ~y~Middle Park.
~s~PLACEHOLDER : This chase will be on mopeds.
BERNIE1.translated: ~s~PLACEHOLDER : This chase will be on mopeds.

BERNIE1.original: ~r~Bernie is not happy.
~r~You have attracted too much police attention. The hater will not attack.
BERNIE1.translated: ~r~你吸引了太多警察的注意。仇同者不会攻击。

BERNIE1.original: ~s~Don't leave ~b~Bernie~s~ behind.
